#### Website

https://r4n.netlify.app

#### About
R for Neuroscience (r4n) will be hosting a series of __free__ workshops to teach R (Python as well?). If you are interested, keep a look out for future workshops! 

#### Future workshops
Here are some potential future workshops:

* Reading in data and tidy data 
* Data wrangling
* Data visualization 
* Model fitting 
* Functions 
* Creating your own website via blogdown
